title: Kevin Hart, Instagram, Salt-N-Pepa, Pat Sajak and more.
itunes:title: Kevin Hart, Instagram, Salt-N-Pepa, Pat Sajak and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Today Fool #2 opens up the show and we show love to all the veterans one more time. Kevin Hart makes his first public appearance since his accident. Instagram has got consumers feeling some type of way. Trina Da Baddest B goes off on a racist white woman in Walmart. A substitute teacher in Texas gets fired and arrested for alleged assault. J. Anthony Brown will be releasing his first blues album. Despite all the chaos caused, Popeyes will be keeping their chicken sandwich on the menu nationwide. Pat Sajak had emergency surgery to repair a blocked intestine. Lifetime announces the cast for their upcoming biopic for Salt-N-Pepa. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about changing your environment in order to grow, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
